metadata.title: CVE-2016-2152 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in auth/db/auth.php inMoodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.13, 2.8.x before 2.8.11, 2.9.xbefore 2.9.5, and 3.0.x before 3.0.3 allow remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via an external DB profile field.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
